raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

* The PDK1 sample His <sub>6</sub> -PDK1 (A1-50) (3.4 nM), the PDK1 substrate biotin-bA-bA-KTFCGTPEYLAPEVRREP- RILSEEEQEMFRDFDYIADWC (400 nM), 4 μM ATP (with 0.2 pCi <sup>33</sup> P ATP / well) and the test substance are incubated in 50 μΙ standard test solution for 60 min at 30 ° C.
* The experimental approaches are carried out in the presence of 100 nM staurosporine.
* The determination of IC <sub>50</sub> values (50% inhibition) is carried out with the help of statistical programs such as RS1.
* 4 μM ATP (with 0.2 pCi <sup>33</sup> P ATP / well) 
* The PDK1 substrate biotin-bA-bA-KTFCGTPEYLAPEVRREP- RILSEEEQEMFRDFDYIADWC (400 nM)

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Values of the test substance treated batches are calculated as percent of control and IC50 values are determined by RS1. 
As a pharmacological blank, the signals obtained from cells treated with 10 μΜ staurosporine are subtracted from all other mixtures.
